name: Infinite Machine
description:
Activate by sending 1 face-up "Empty Machine" in your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY. Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by an opponent's card effect. Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects.
â— During the Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Timelord" monster from your hand.
â— Target 1 "Timelord" monster in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, then you can Set 1 "Infinite Light" from your hand or Deck to your Spell & Trap Zone.
